channel.title: admin on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Academic

item.description: Adrien is a research statistician with interest in applied statistics and probabilistic risk assessments. I have advanced knowledge in Bayesian and computational statistics, and good knowledge in monitoring and modeling multivariate and spatio-temporal processes. He obtained his PhD in applied statistics from Universite de Rennes 1, France in 2010, applying statistical methods to the tracking of multiple targets using a network of basic sensors. Between 2010 and 2012 he worked as a Lecturer in Statistics at Universite Paris Dauphine, France and then joined the Institut Mines - Telecom Lille - Douai, France as a research associate.
